short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu item to close the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of managing countless open tabs in your browser? Our "Close Tab" Chrome extension is here to help! With a simple right-click, you can effortlessly close any tab without the hassle of navigating tiny tab buttons. Perfect for those who often find themselves overwhelmed with multiple tabs, this extension adds a convenient option to your context menu, allowing you to close the current tab quickly and easily. Save time, reduce clutter, and streamline your browsing experience. Install now and take control of your tabs with just a click!
